text: // $Id: ary.java,v 1.1 2004-05-22 07:27:00 bfulgham Exp $ // http://www.bagley.org/~doug/shootout/ // this program is modified from: // http://cm.bell-labs.com/cm/cs/who/bwk/interps/pap.html // Timing Trials, or, the Trials of Timing: Experiments with Scripting // and User-Interface Languages by Brian W. Kernighan and // Christopher J. Van Wyk. import java.io.*; import java.util.*; public class ary { public static void main(String args[]) { int i, j, k, n = Integer.parseInt(args[0]); int x[] = new int[n]; int y[] = new int[n]; for (i = 0; i < n; i++) x[i] = i + 1; for (k = 0; k < 1000; k++ ) for (j = n-1; j >= 0; j--) y[j] += x[j]; System.out.println(y[0] + " " + y[n-1]); } }// class below has no smell
